edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.authentication

Interface PasswordCryptographer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Sha256Password

    public interface PasswordCryptographer
    Interface for password hashing and cryptography mechanism. This system has two use-cases: (1) UserManager during User creation (to hash the desired password). (2) Authentication system during password checking phase. Implementations of the interface determine the hash mechanism to use (e.g. sha-256, md5) and how the salt is generated.
    Author:
    twack

    • Method Detail

      • generateHash

        java.lang.String generateHash(java.lang.String password)
        Generate a hashed string from the given password.
        Parameters:
        password - the user's desired password (plaintext)
        Returns:
        a hashed & salted password to store in the database

      • validate

        boolean validate(java.lang.String password,
               java.lang.String hash)
        Validates if the given password matches the given hash.
        Parameters:
        password - the password credential given
        hashed - a hash string to compare against the password
        Returns:
        true if the password matches once hashed.
